RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PLAY MASTER broke in good order, settled in mid pack while four wide into the first turn, continued to race unhurried and outside up the backstretch, rallied three wide into the lane, reeled in the leader inside the furlong grounds and was edging away late under steady handling. PAYOFF CYCLE broke on top, with the pace immediately, dueled in the two path through the first turn and up the backstretch, shook clear with just over four furlongs to run, continued to maintained a sizable advantage past midstretch, could not contain the winner, remained clear for the place. PUTTHEHAMMERDOWN settled off the pace and the inside, main body up the backstretch, splits foes outside a tiring early leader midway on the second turn, steadily gaining on the top two latee. CHIEF KIMOSABI one paced between rivals, came four wide into the lane, lacked a closing response. PLENTY OF CENTS chased the dueling leaders for almost a half, moved closer to the runner up late backstretch, chased that one through the final turn and then weakened through the stretch. UNBRIDLED PULPIT last to leave, continued to be devoid of speed, picked off a couple of tiring rivals late after altering course in midstretch. LITTLE STAR TARGET remained back in failing to threaten. HESACALENDARBOY dueled up front inside the runner up, stopped with a half mild remaining.

ENTRY.NAME: Putthehammerdown
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace inside, split foes 2nd,getting to runner up late

ENTRY.NAME: Hesacalendarboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Payoff Cycle
ENTRY.OWNER: Lange I L and Credeur Don
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front 2p, shook free, could not last

ENTRY.NAME: Little Star Target
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Plenty of Cents
ENTRY.OWNER: Cooper Juan K and Thomas Otis
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased duel, closer into far turn, chased, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Pulpit
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Kimosabi
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, 4w into lane, lacked kick

ENTRY.NAME: Play Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in good order, 4w 7/8, mid pack, 3w rally,reeled in leader

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 5F Turf CR: 79. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PITALE took command along the inside soon after the start, narrowly showed the way into and through the turn, briefly shook clear past the furlong marker then had enough left in the final strides to withstand the next two at the wire. BORDEAUX RED lacked early foot in trailing early, continued back while toward the inside turn, switched to the outside when straightened for home, finished willingly to be getting to the winner late while between horses at the wire. DRAG MALIBU pressed the issue up the backstretch from between foes, appeared rank, checked up between horses early the turn, continued to steady, fell back to trail, roused in upper stretch, also finished with good energy while widest of the first flight at the finish. GOLDUSTER broke well, pressed the winner from the three path in the run up the backstretch, continued to apply pressure through the turn, angled in toward the gap with less than a furlong to run, little left in the late going. ZAICI forwardly placed early outside, remained in a striking position four wide early turn, went flat in the final furlong to lose a couple of positions. CATALINA LATRINA in mid pack and inside, continued to idle along upper straight, bothered slightly with less than a furlong remained when GOLDUSTER angled in, no late kick. CHECKULATER last away, had nothing for the drive. A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF ZAICI AGAINST GOLDUSTER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE INTO THE TURN WAS NOT ALLOWED.

ENTRY.NAME: Pitale
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command inside, all the pace, enough left late

ENTRY.NAME: Catalina Latrina
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, slight bother 1/16, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Drag Malibu
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early btwn,rank, checked, shuffled 3/8, coming late

ENTRY.NAME: Bordeaux Red
ENTRY.OWNER: Brehm Erich G Barrows Matthew Fox James W Hovitz Charles P Michaels Lee and Mitc
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot toward rail, switched out 3/16, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Golduster
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, pressed 3w, angled in late, little left late

ENTRY.NAME: Checkulater
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, nothing for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Zaici
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed outside, pressed 4w early turn, went flat late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RISKY PRIORITY off slow then was slow to settle to fall further back, three wide far turn, dropped to the rail late in the bend when advancing, continued to make some progress up the inside past the furlong marker, altered course to the outside for room with a sixteenth to run, late bid, dug in gamely to narrowly prevail. HARD KINGS lacked speed, split rivals when commencing to rally late in the turn, continued to close, late bid outside the winner, outfinished in the final strides to miss. FLASHY LOVER pressed the early leader from the outside, engaged that one into the stretch, dueled past the furlong marker, not enough late while inside the winner and between rivals at the end. BLEEP BLEEP broke out but on top, set the pace inside, responded when challenged in upper stretch, gave ground grudgingly to the wire. CALL ME FIREY broke at the break, went one paced throughout while off the inside in lacking a closing response. WICKED TOUGH within striking distance outside, four wide into the lane, lacked a rally. CAMALEON finished early, fell far back, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Camaleon
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, far back, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Kings
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, split foes 1/4, outside rally, late bid,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Bleep Bleep
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out but on top, set the pace, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Call Me Firey
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered start, one paced off rail

ENTRY.NAME: Risky Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, slow to settle, trailed, dropped in,altered 1/16,up

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Lover
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed issue outside, stretch duel, not enuf late

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Tough
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 4w into lane, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR. WIMBLEDON BAY close from the start, pressured the leader from the two path into the turn, engaged that one from the outside turn, wore that rival down nearing the furlong marker, held the runner up safe late. GOLDEN QUALITY prompted the issue up the backstretch in the three path, continued on the outside into the lane, slowly getting to the winner late, clearly second best. GRAHAM 'S CRUISER in mid pack after moving outside, four wide through the turn, finished up best of the rest without posing a serious threat to the top two. ITELLYOUTHEFACTS sprinted clear out of the inside and moved to the inside, set the pace for a half then weakened when headed by the winner midway on the turn. LET'S GO RANDOM lacked early foot, steered out, four wide into the lane, went one paced to the wire in lacking a closing response. CARRIES MAN broke back, raced outside, four wide turning for home, improved slightly without posing a serious threat. LONG ARROW made little impact while racing toward the inside. SIXTO last away, trailed most of the way in showing little. BRADSTREET flashed brief early speed and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Long Arrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: made little impact toward rail

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Go Random
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, steered 4w into lane, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Graham 's Cruiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, moved out, 4w turn, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Sixto
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Bradstreet
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Carries Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, improved slightly, never dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Quality
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 3w, slowly gaining late, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Wimbledon Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: close from start, bid 2p turn, wore down leader,held sway late

ENTRY.NAME: Itellyouthefacts
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear out of chute,pace inside, weakened when headeed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 78. Claiming Purse 20000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 13, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, if for $12,500, allowed 2 lbs . (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONITOR MILLS broke on top, was clear and in hand past the wire the first time, continued to rate through some moderate fractions, remained clear through the lane when put to pressure. JOEY'S LIGHTENING settled off the early pace, moved closest to the winner in the second turn, chased that one into the stretch, could do little with that one the final furlong, extended margin for the runner up position. BOULDERING broke back, moved up to race in the main group while three wide, continued at that pace into and through the stretch to report home best of the others. SALUTE NOW within striking distance early, fell back a bit the middle half, came on the outside for the drive, lacked a closing kick. JIMMIE'S HALO void of speed, continued back in trailing into the far turn, passed a couple of tiring rivals while not a serious factor. GENERAL EISENHOWER a bit wide into the first turn when closest to the winner, continued to pursue that one in the run up the backstretch, gave way. BATTLE OF WILL off the pace while outside, four wide through the second turn, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Joey's Lightening
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, closer 2nd turn, chased, no late gain

ENTRY.NAME: General Eisenhower
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit wide 1st turn, chased, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Bouldering
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, main group 3w, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Monitor Mills
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, clear and in hand, moderate pace, stayed clear

ENTRY.NAME: Battle of Will
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the pace, four wide second turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Jimmie's Halo
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed in trailing, paced tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Salute Now
ENTRY.OWNER: Cascio Andrew J and D and F Horse Farms
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early, fell back, lacked closing kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 90. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 13, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since May 13, 202 3 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOOLISH STEVE lacked early foot off the inside, ranged up with a solid four wide move to contend turning for home, lugged in under a right handed crop nearing the furlong grounds to help tighten up inner rivals, was quickly straightened, outkicked LIKEN IT in the late going to be edging away at the end. LIKEN IT also raced well back off the early pace, advanced into contention three wide turn, bid between horses and inside the winner upper stretch, pushed in by that rival soon after, could not get back to that one late, far clear of the others. BOYFRIEND MATERIAL fell back in the turn to trail, four wide into the stretch, some traffic inside the furlong grounds, up late for the show when clear, no threat to the top two. G VICTORY pressed early off the inside, moved up to duel in the two path turn, was vying approaching midstretch when put in tight and squeezed with both inside and outside pressure, weakened. FULL IMPACT moved up to take control leaving the chute to show the way up the backstretch, dueled turn, drifted out nearing the furlong grounds to help tighten up G VICTORY, faltered soon after. STEPHEN'S ANSWER forwardly placed in the early going, faded. DRAFT CHOICE was finished early. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE RUN THROUGH MIDSTRETCH AND A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF LIKEN IT AGAINST THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE WITH A FURLONG TO RUN, THE RESULT WAS ALLOWED TO STAND.

ENTRY.NAME: Draft Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Stephen's Answer
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Full Impact
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to take control,pace, dueled inside,drifted 1/8,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Foolish Steve
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, ranged up 4w turn,lugged in,tightened foes 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Boyfriend Material
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back turn, 4w into lane, traffic late, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Liken It
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, 3w gain turn, bid btwn, pushed in 1/8,well clr 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: G Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, dueled turn, squeezed 1/8, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 95. Allowance Purse 31000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALW. or Which Have Never Won Two Races. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 13 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REAL CITY SPEED hopped at the break to be away slowly, raced back and outside, ranged up four wide to challenge late in the final turn, put a head in front entering the stretch, accelerated quickly to be clear, held the runner up safe late under steady handling. DEER CROSSING void of speed, asked along in the second bend, four path and behind the winner into the lane, steadily getting to that one late. TOUCHDOWN JOE in the first flight into the first turn while three wide and between horses, bid before a half, put a head in front while closest to the inside far turn, vied into the lane, proved no match for the top two late, comfortably saved the show. TARAASHOQ bothered a bit at the start, lagged well back for six furlongs, came three wide for the drive, found best stride too late while improving position. PEPPER JACK lunged, popped stall doors prior to the start, broke out, quickly straightened to vie into the first turn between, dueled early backstretch, fell back, little for the stretch run.'. LAURI'S WISH flashed some brief speed along the inside, fell back before a half, also had little for the stretch drive. MINNESOTA MIRACLE pressed the issue into the first bend from the four path,moved up to duel before a half, continued to vie through the second turn then gave way at the head of the lane. DEVIL'S HARVEST broke through the gate before the start, reloaded, away in good order, mid pack early, stopped, far back, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Lauri's Wish
ENTRY.OWNER: Stewart, Chad J. and Lenci, Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Harvest
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke thru gate, stopped, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Deer Crossing
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, asked along 4w into lane,gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Pepper Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: popped stall doors, broke out, vied, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Taraashoq
ENTRY.COMMENT: bother brk, void of speed, continued to lag, stride late

ENTRY.NAME: Real City Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped, off slow, outside gain 2nd, took over, quickly clear,held

ENTRY.NAME: Touchdown Joe
ENTRY.OWNER: Angelle Glenn M and Tamporello Glenn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: 1st flight 3w, closer before half, took over, no match top 2 late

ENTRY.NAME: Minnesota Miracle
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 4w 1st turn, dueled, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 36. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TERRI GOT A FRIEND back off the early pace, angled out four wide into the stretch, finished full of run to win going away at the ned. GRACE'S SOLDIER within striking distance, moved closer on the leader turning into the lane, bid between horses, took over, proved no match for the winner late. CALCITE in mid pack outside, closer three wide late into the stretch, brief bid, all out to save the show. SPARKLE CITY dueled up the backstretch in the two path, shook clear in the turn, weakened in the drive. SHEEZA PRIORITY off a step slow, improved through traffic down the stretch, not a serious threat. TOUCHING ACES off a step slow when put in tight, trailed well back for a half, showed some belated interest to improve position. A. P. STYLE broke back, improved four to five wide through the turn, flattened out through the lane. GLORIOUS GEARS broke in, brush, saved ground when well back off the pace, lacked a rally. THAT IS AWESOME in mid pack early, faded through the stretch. MARDI GRAS GORMLEY forwardly placed early, retreated after a half. DOWNTOWN PORTER broke with the leaders, dueled early along the inside, stopped in the turn, fell far back to be distanced, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Downtown Porter
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke leaders, dueled early inside, stopped, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkle City
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled backstretch 2p, shook clear, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Touching Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight, off step slow, trailed well back, belated interest

ENTRY.NAME: Glorious Gears
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, brush, saved ground, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: That Is Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack early, faded stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Mardi Gras Gormley
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Sheeza Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, improved through traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Terri Got a Friend
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, angled out 4w upper stretch, full of run

ENTRY.NAME: Grace's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, bid btwn foes into lane, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Calcite
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, closer three wide turn, bid, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: A. P. Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, middle move 4-5w turn, flattened
